confirm_unregistration_intent.description: Fingerprint mismatch (Bob's fingerprint in ETH message, Alice's PQ signature)
Wrong domain separator in PQ message (all zeros)
ETH address mismatch (Bob's address in PQ message, Bob's fingerprint in ETH message)
PQ fingerprint mismatch (Bob's fingerprint in ETH message)
Wrong domain separator in EIP712 signature (all zeros)
